reviewText:
All you have to do is pay the shipping cost.  Call customer service at toll free 888-367-8777 extension 0 to order

  2nd National Safe Boating Test DVD
Test your boating knowledge Includes many safety tips and 27 boating safety questions to test your knowledge on such tops as:
** Homeland Security
** Rules of the Road
** Aids to Navigation
** Carbon Monoxide
** Small Boat Safety and more

08-30-117  No Charge
